code: export var BASE_URL=" https://auth.nomoreparties.co";function handleReply(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));}export function register(data){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(data)}).then(handleReply);}export function login(data){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(data)}).then(handleReply);}export function checkToken(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:"GET",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(handleReply);}
